name: North Oakland Helping Hands - General Closet
short_desc: Provides business attire to men and women seeking employment. Accepts donations of clothing appropriate for job interviews and business use
description: Operates general clothing closet for men, women and children. Also offers dry goods as available. Open Monday, Tuesday and Thursday, 1:30-3:30.Donations are welcome, tax-deductible and are accepted at 2000 San Pablo Avenue, Room 353, Oakland, from 8-4:30.
